slide-1.title: Absolutely free app
slide-1.text: Application was created with love and enthusiasm. Without any sponsorship thats why it's still free.

slide-2.title: First online see-battle
slide-2.text: Invite your friends. Make your own fight with your friends. Become a leadership.

slide-3.title: Registration
slide-3.text: To make stats you need to create you account. Don't worry you wouldn't have any advertisement and spam. Nobody will see you email, only you nickname. Anyway you can delete your account later.

confirmation.title: You need to confirm that you agree.
